reviewText: A little too long with too much "filler"....doesn't come close to capturing "being there" and would be nice to see a video more up to date that included more highlights of the city of Albuquerque also.
Sent to a friend who missed the Fiesta. He was very pleased.
Much better in person great video for kids also.
My son loves hot air balloons, and loves going to the balloon Fiesta every year.  This is a great show for kids or even adults interested in some If the details behind these kind of festivals.

I have a great love of balloons no matter what kind including
the little ones sold in stores.  I love their colors.  This DVD made
me feel like I was actually up in a hot air balloon.  Great

My two year old adores hot air balloons. It is difficult to find a DVD that focuses on hot air balloons exclusively. This video comes close but I think it includes too many cut aways of people milling around or waiting. It's all about the balloons people. Not so much about tourists.
